SEARCH
Package com.etiennecollin.tp2.clientSimple

Class Client

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.tp2.clientSimple.Client
public class Client extends Object
The Client class represents a client that can interact with a server through a socket connection.

The client can send registration forms, load courses for a specific semester, and disconnect from the server. The client is run using the static method run(int port), which connects the client to the server and then allows the user to input commands that are sent to the server. The client uses object input/output streams to communicate with the server.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static void run(int port) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Runs the client, allowing the user to interact with the server.
      Parameters:
      port - The port number of the server to connect to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the methods getUserInput() or cleanup() throw the exception or when dealing with the client input/output streams.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the method getUserInput() throws the exception.

    • getUserInput

      public static void getUserInput() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Gets the user input command and processes, it if it is valid, before passing it to the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the methods register(), getCourses() or disconnect() throw the exception, or if an I/O error occurs when dealing with the client input/output streams.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the methods register() or getCourses() throw the exception.

    • cleanup

      public static void cleanup() throws IOException
      Closes the objectOutputStream, objectInputStream, and client.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when closing the streams or the client socket.

    • register

      public static String register(String[] command, Scanner scanner) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Sends a registration form to the server.
      Parameters:
      command - The registration command and its arguments.
      scanner - The scanner which will read the user input.
      Returns:
      The answer from the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the method createCourse() throws the exception or if an I/O error occurs when dealing with the client input/output streams.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the method createCourse() throws the exception or if the returned String by the server is invalid.

    • getCourses

      public static Object getCourses(String[] command) throws IOException, IllegalArgumentException, ClassNotFoundException
      Sends a command to the server to load available courses with the option to filter for a specific semester.
      Parameters:
      command - The load command and its optional argument.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when dealing with the client input/output streams.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the command has an incorrect number of arguments.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the returned Course object by the server is invalid.

    • disconnect

      public static void disconnect() throws IOException
      Disconnects the client from the server by sending a DISCONNECT_COMMAND to the server through the objectOutputStream.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when writing to the objectOutputStream.

    • createStudent

      public static Student createStudent(Scanner scanner)
      Creates an array of strings containing the information about a student.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner which will read the user input.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the information about a student.

      Returns:
      A valid Course object.
      Throws:

    • isCourseValid

      public static boolean isCourseValid(Course targetCourse) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Validates that a course is available to take.
      Parameters:
      targetCourse - The course that is searched in the list of available courses.
      Returns:
      Whether the course is available or not.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the method getCourses() throws the exception.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the method getCourses() throws the exception.
